menu.name: Espresso
menu.ingredients: 1 Shot of espresso in an espresso cup

menu.name: Double Espresso
menu.ingredients: 2 shots of espresso in an espresso cup

menu.name: Macchiato
menu.ingredients: 1 Shot of espresso in a short glass or espresso cup. A dollop of steamed milk and foam placed on top of the espresso

menu.name: Americano
menu.ingredients: Fill a cup with 2/3rds full of hot water. Extract 1 shot of espresso over the hot water

menu.name: Café Latte
menu.ingredients: Extract 1 shot of espresso into a tumbler glass• Add steamed milk. 1cm of micro-foam on top of the steamed milk

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.ingredients: Extract 1 shot of espresso into a cup• Add steamed milk. Add 2-3cm of micro-foam on top of the steamed milk. Sprinkle chocolate on top of the coffee

menu.name: Mocha
menu.ingredients: Extract 1 shot of espresso into a cup. Add one spoon of chocolate powder into the espresso shot and mix. Add steamed milk. Add 2-3cm of micro-foam. Sprinkle chocolate powder on top

menu.name: Frappe
menu.ingredients: 2 tsp instant coffee powder, 2 tsp sugar, 1 tbsp cold water, 1 cup cold water or cold milk

menu.name: Mocha Cola
menu.ingredients: 1 cup very strong brewed coffee, 12 oz. can of cola, 3 cups chocolate milk, Ice cubes divided between 4 chilled glasses, Whipped cream or vanilla ice cream, for topping

menu.name: Coconut Iced Coffee
menu.ingredients: 5 oz strongly brewed coffee, 1/3 cup coconut sweetened condensed milk, 1/2 tsp vanilla extract, 2-3 tbsp coconut milk, coffee cubes, coconut whipped cream, 1 tbsp toasted coconut, 2 tbsp chocolate sauce

menu.name: Hot Mulled Ginger-Spiced Cider
menu.ingredients: Cloves, orange rind, allspice, cinnamon, apple jelly, nutmeg, and zesty fresh ginger

menu.name: Donut Muffins
menu.ingredients: ⅓ cup unsalted butter, softened to room temperature, ½ cup granulated sugar, 1 large egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, ½ cup milk, 1½ cups white whole wheat flour (or all-purpose flour), 1½ teaspoon baking powder, ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, ½ teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons unsalted butter, ¾ cup powdered sugar

menu.name: Cake Donuts
menu.ingredients:
1½ cups flour
1½ teaspoons baking powder
½ teaspoon salt
½ teaspoon nutmeg
½ cup brown sugar
4 tablespoons unsalted butter, cold and cubed
1 egg
½ cup 2 percent low-fat milk
½ cup frozen blueberries
